description: Beautifully rehabbed home in Bristol Borough. Original Borough home offers front covered porch perfect for morning coffee. Living room offering recessed lighting and crown molding. Eat in kitchen with tile flooring, Granite Counter Tops, Glass tile back splash, soft closing drawers, loads of cabinet storage and all newer appliances included. 1 spacious bedroom with ample closet space.  bath enjoys tile flooring, Granite top vanity and stall shower with tile surround.  Hardwood flooring on floor, Newer windows, Heat and Central Air. 1 car detached garage accessible via alley and back yard, Newer Flooring and Paint. Plus newly finished basement with TV room, secret passage to the wine cellar (straight out of CLUE) and a utility / storage room! Enjoy cooking out and entertaining on the newly painted back deck and back yard. Take a short walk to historic downtown Bristol and enjoy all that Mill Street and the river front has to offer. Plus, never be without coffee with a Wawa at both ends of town!

title: Huge 3 Bedroom w/ Roof Deck in Art Museum
description:
Attention to detail and beautifully planned space show in the finishes and flow of this magnificent home. Enter into a wide and open living room with rich dark hardwood floors. Large dining room easily accommodates a full dining room table, and is perfect for entertaining.
Kitchen has a wood breakfast bar and ample counter space, great cabinet storage space, and all stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. Natural light fills the space, with a window overlooking a HUGE fenced rear deck - ready for your outdoor furniture and your enjoyment this summer!
First floor features a half bath, and basement provides additional storage. Second level features two bedrooms each the size of a primary suite, one with a walk in closet, and an elegantly appointed full bath with dual sinks. Third floor is a full suite level, with everything you could want: suburban size walk in closet with custom built-ins for storage, spa-like bath with glass enclosed shower, stone floors, and double sink, large space to easily fit large bedroom sets, plus a private patio with sliding glass doors, offering sweeping views of the city.
This home offers an excellent location, with Fairmount Park just steps down the street, and all of the restaurants/cafes and museums that the Fairmount / Art Museum / Brewerytown area has to offer just blocks away. Easy highway access to 76 nearby from Girard Ave for an easy commute to the suburbs. Pet friendly with pet deposit. This beautifully built home is a must see.
Listing provided by Compass Pennsylvania LLC

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. title: This One Is Just a Special Complete Renovation!!
description:
This one is just special. Complete renovation that transformed a cool loft into a modern masterpiece. This expansive space features two bedrooms (both fully-enclosed), two baths and more than 1300 square feet with views of the city skyline. The kitchen was reconfigured and upgraded with stainless steel KitchenAid appliances, custom charred oak upper shelving and a custom high top island. Custom woodwork (throughout unit) created by local, modern design firm, Studio Cidra. A glass partition was installed between the kitchen and the master bedroom for privacy and full enclosure. Custom sill for the window ledge and charred oak cabinets along the living room wall frame the stunning fireplace accent wall. This wall was treated with dark Venetian plaster to give the space warmth and dimensionality. Both bathrooms were fully renovated with luxury finishes. Master, en-suite bath features a new custom vanity and a walk-in shower with custom shower glass. Second bathroom offers a shower/bathtub and provides access to utility closet with stacked, front load washer and dryer. Refinished hardwood floors throughout bring additional warmth to the space, as well as, rustic charm. Custom closets installed in the bedrooms and hallway offer extensive storage. What more could this stunner offer? Oh, a covered parking spot in the secure, attached garage. If you’re seeking a luxury space that is not cookie-cutter, this is for you. 2200 Arch Street Condominiums is a full-service, New York-style loft building that offers amazing amenities and has one of the best locations in Center City. Just a short walk from Rittenhouse Square, 30th St Station, Aramark, Morgan Lewis, Comcast the Schuylkill River Trail and the Parkway, everything you need for is within a few blocks. Adding to the convenience are Trader Joe’s and the new Giant Riverwalk, which are directly across the street. This home is within the Greenfield Catchment and includes one (1) covered parking spot.

Amazing opportunity to live in Bridgeview, a 3 Bedroom/3 Bath Newer Construction townhome community featuring Central AC, hardwood flooring throughout, ceiling fans, all windows w/ blinds, great closets & storage, finished basement, roof deck and off-street parking with fabulous waterfront views located in the Meredith Catchment. Finished basement has additional living space -perfect for a gym, media room, home office or playroom -with plenty of additional storage and a private laundry area. Designated 1 car parking space located behind the unit. title: Center City Philadelphia Apts Near Rittenhouse Sq Be a Part of History
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.ÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

One block away from the new Green Street Dog Park, the Spring Gardens community gardens, and the premier Roberto Clemente Park & Playground. Enjoy numerous nearby cafes and restaurants. Easy access to the brand new Whole Foods, Target, FedEx Office, and the Retro Fitness gym. Transportation is easy - considered a Walker's Paradise (Walk Score 92), a Biker's Paradise (Bike Score 95), and excellent access to bus routes and the Broad Street Subway Line.This is a definite must-see!

title: Professional on-site management team, New fitness center
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
